meanings.definition: Still in existence; not used up or exhausted.
meanings.sent1: The cake had some remaining slices for us to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: She checked the fridge for any remaining food before going to the store.
meanings.sent3: The remaining cookies in the jar mysteriously disappeared overnight.
meanings.sent4: The remaining sunlight painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The remaining leaves on the tree danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: Left over; not used or consumed.
meanings.sent1: He packed the remaining snacks for the road trip.
meanings.sent2: The store discounted the remaining winter jackets to make space for spring clothes.
meanings.sent3: The remaining pieces of the puzzle seemed to mock her efforts.
meanings.sent4: The remaining time on the clock ticked away slowly during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The remaining sand in the hourglass signaled the end of the game.

meanings.definition: The part that is left when the rest is taken away.
meanings.sent1: She carefully counted the remaining pieces of the jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The remaining of the cake was saved for the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The remaining of the class giggled at the teacher's joke.
meanings.sent4: The remaining of the book held the most thrilling chapter.
meanings.sent5: The remaining of the paint was just enough to finish the artwork.
